author: Kate King
title: New Jersey Democrats Look to Strengthen State Gun Laws
text:
Democrats in New Jersey are moving forward with several bills to further tighten the stateâ€™s gun laws, which are already among the strictest in the nation, making the Garden State the latest to take up the issue after the Florida school shooting that killed 17.
Lawmakers on the Judiciary Committee in the state Assembly will hold a public hearing Wednesday on seven proposed measures, including legislation that would allow law enforcement to seize firearms from people identified by mental-health professionals as serious threats...
